help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and learn how to use JobQuest
help.noResults: No questions found matching your search.
help.contactTitle: Can't find what you're looking for?
help.contactSubtitle: If you have more questions or need additional help, don't hesitate to contact us.

account-create.q: How do I create my account?
account-create.a: You can create your account using your email and password, or log in with Google. Simply go to the home page and complete the registration form.

profile-complete.q: How do I complete my profile?
profile-complete.a: After registering, you will see an onboarding modal where you can complete your basic information (name, surname, gender, date of birth). You can also edit your profile from the Profile page at any time.

password-change.q: How do I change my password?
password-change.a: Currently, you can change your password from your Google account if you used OAuth, or by contacting support if you used email/password. We are working on a feature to change password directly from the app.

cv-create.q: How do I create my CV?
cv-create.a: Go to 'My Professional Profile' in the sidebar. There you can add sections like Work Experience, Education, Certifications, Languages, Projects, and Volunteering. Each section has a '+' button to add new items.

cv-export.q: How do I export my CV?
cv-export.a: When you are in the Job Offers section, you can select specific sections of your CV for each offer. Then, in the offer detail view, you will find a button to 'View Personalized CV' that allows you to download a PDF.

cv-ai.q: Can I use AI to improve my CV?
cv-ai.a: Yes! In each CV section (Experience, Education, etc.), when editing, you will see an 'Improve with AI' button that will help you improve descriptions, fix errors, and add relevant tags.

ai-insights.q: How do I use AI Insights?
ai-insights.a: On the CV Builder page, you will find an 'AI Analysis' button that analyzes your complete CV and gives you personalized recommendations. You can also chat with the AI assistant to ask specific questions about your CV.

job-add.q: How do I add a job offer?
job-add.a: Go to 'Job Openings' in the sidebar and click the '+' button in any Kanban column, or 'Add Offer' in the list view. Fill out the form with the offer details.

job-status.q: How do I change the status of an offer?
job-status.a: You can drag and drop offers between columns in the Kanban, or click on an offer to open it and change the status from the dropdown menu.

interview-schedule.q: How do I schedule an interview?
interview-schedule.a: When you change an offer status to 'Interview', a modal will automatically open where you can schedule the interview with date, time, type, and location. You can also add interviews from the offer detail view.

contact-add.q: How do I add a contact?
contact-add.a: When you change an offer status to 'Contacted', a modal will open to add contact information (name, email, role, contact channels). You can also manage contacts from the offer detail view.

job-filter.q: How do I filter my offers?
job-filter.a: In the Job Openings view, you will find filters at the top to filter by status, job type, and salary range. You can also search by company name or position.

xp-works.a: You earn experience points (XP) by completing actions on the platform: adding sections to your CV, updating your profile, adding offers, scheduling interviews, etc. Each action has a different XP value.

level-up.a: As you earn XP, you will level up automatically. Each level requires more XP than the previous one. You can see your progress in the Dashboard or on the sidebar.

badges-what.a: Badges are special achievements you unlock by completing certain actions or reaching milestones. For example, 'First CV' when completing your first section, or 'Expert Interviewer' when scheduling 10 interviews.

badges-view.q: Where do I see my badges?
badges-view.a: You can view all your badges on the 'Achievements' page in the sidebar. There you will see the badges you have unlocked and the ones you can still get.

ai-insights-what.a: AI Insights is a comprehensive analysis of your CV that uses artificial intelligence to give you personalized recommendations on how to improve your CV, which sections to strengthen, and what skills to highlight.

ai-recommender.q: How do I use AI Recommender?
ai-recommender.a: In each CV section (Experience, Education, etc.), when editing, you will see an 'Improve with AI' button. This assistant will improve your descriptions, correct errors, and suggest improvements.

login-issue.a: Check that you are using the correct email. If you used Google OAuth, make sure you use the same Google account. If the problem persists, contact support.

save-issue.a: Make sure to click 'Save' after making changes. If the problem persists, check your internet connection and reload the page. If it still doesn't work, contact support.

account-delete.q: How do I delete my account?
account-delete.a: Go to 'Privacy' in the sidebar, and then to the 'Delete Account' section. Read the warnings carefully and type 'DELETE' to confirm. This action is permanent and irreversible.

data-export.q: How do I export my data?
data-export.a: Go to 'Privacy' in the sidebar. There you will find buttons to export all your data in JSON or CSV format. This includes your profile, full CV, offers, interviews, and more.

contact-support.a: You can contact us via the support email found on the Privacy or Terms of Service page. You can also use the feedback form on this help page.

privacySettings.title: Privacy Settings
privacySettings.subtitle: Manage your personal data and privacy according to GDPR

exportData.title: Export your Data
exportData.description: You can download all your personal data stored in JobQuest. The data includes your profile, complete CV, job offers, interviews, contacts, gamification data, and AI analysis.
exportData.note: The JSON file contains all your data in a structured format. The CSV file contains a simplified version of tabular data.
exportData.error: Error exporting data. Please try again.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: You can permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

warningList.profile: Your profile and all personal information will be deleted
warningList.cv: Your complete CV (experience, education, etc.) will be deleted
warningList.offers: All your job offers and applications will be deleted
warningList.interviews: All your scheduled interviews will be deleted
warningList.contacts: All your contacts and notes will be deleted
warningList.gamification: Your gamification data (XP, badges, etc.) will be deleted
warningList.ai: Your saved AI analyses will be deleted
warningList.files: All uploaded files (photos, images) will be deleted
warningList.irreversible: You will not be able to recover this information afterwards

deleteAccount.modalDescription: This action will permanently delete your account and all your data. This action CANNOT be undone.
deleteAccount.modalConfirm: To confirm, type "ELIMINAR" in the field below:
deleteAccount.success: Account deleted successfully. You will be redirected...
deleteAccount.error: Error deleting account. Please try again.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us when you use JobQuest, including:
list: Information about job offers you manage

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the collected information to:
list: Personalize your experience on the platform
Process your requests and manage your account

sections.title: 3. Sharing Information
sections.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following circumstances:
list: With service providers who help us operate (Supabase, Vercel)
When required by law or to protect our rights

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including:
list: Row Level Security (RLS) in the database

sections.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
list: Object to the processing of your data
Export your data in a structured format
sections.footer: To exercise these rights, you can contact us through the platform or delete your account from the profile settings.

sections.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
sections.footer: You can manage cookie preferences from your browser settings.

sections.title: 7. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal information while your account is active or as needed to provide our services. You can request deletion of your account at any time.

sections.title: 8. Changes to this Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes through a notification on the platform or by email.

sections.title: 9. Contact
sections.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us through the platform.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using JobQuest, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you should not use our service.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
sections.content: JobQuest is a web platform that helps users manage their job search through CV building tools, job offer tracking, and gamification elements.

sections.title: 3. User Account
sections.content: To use JobQuest, you must create an account using Google authentication. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.title: 4. Acceptable Use
sections.content: You agree to use JobQuest only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe on the rights of third parties. You must not:
list: Attempt to access other users' accounts
Use the service for illegal activities
Interfere with the operation of the service
Attempt to access restricted areas of the system

sections.title: 5. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on JobQuest, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, is the property of JobQuest and is protected by intellectual property laws.

sections.title: 6. Privacy
sections.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our <link>Privacy Policy</link> to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.

sections.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: JobQuest is provided "as is" without guarantees of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be error-free, uninterrupted, or defect-free. We will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

sections.title: 8. Modifications to the Service
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time without prior notice.

sections.title: 9. Contact
sections.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, you can contact us through the platform.
